summary: Implements a pass that monitors successive DAG executions to identify a relative semi‑stable or local minimum point. It records the state of relevant property‑set fields, keeps a deep copy of the best DAG seen, and after a configurable backtrack depth either signals that a fixed point has been reached or restores the previously stored minimum, thereby providing a loop‑break condition for optimization processes where a true fixed point may never occur.
business_intent: Enable iterative synthesis or optimization workflows to terminate automatically when further improvements cease, either by detecting a stable configuration or by reverting to the best observed solution after a set number of iterations, improving efficiency and preventing endless loops.
